      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity filterWinesColor(FilterDTO filterDTO)
      Method which receives list of filters and then calls drools service which returns list of wines that correspond to those filters.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getMissingGrapesForWine(MissingGrapesDTO missingGrapesDTO)
      Method which receives list of grapes and one wine and calls drools service which then returns list of grapes that are missing for that chosen wine.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getPossibleWinesFromGrapes(GrapeListDTO grapeListDTO)
      Method which receives list of grapes and calls drools service which then returns possible wines that could be made from those grapes.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getPotentialWines(GrapeListDTO grapeListDTO)
      Method which receives list of grapes and calls drools service which then returns list of wines that could be made from those grapes, and for each wine list of missing grapes.
